price: Ɔno na nsuom hyεn a εnenam po so tesε mmepͻ atenten no yε Ne dea.
arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلۡجَوَارِ ٱلۡمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walahu al-jawāri al-munshaātu fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
